story_26_07000/2401_1001_0200_10:
Easy there, Pidgeot. What’s gotten into you all of 
a sudden?
story_26_07000/2401_1001_0400_10: Oh, hey guys! What’re you all doing here?
story_26_07000/2401_1001_0700_10:
Pidgeot just took off flying, so I chased after it and
ended up here!
story_26_07000/2401_1001_0800_10:
Anyway...since I’m here, let’s have a
Pokémon battle!
story_26_07000/2401_1001_0900_10: Wait a minute... Could this mean...
story_26_07000/2401_1001_1000_10:
The machine worked when we thought it was a
failure, and then it failed when we thought it was
working... So is our invention a success or not?
story_26_07000/2401_1001_1200_10:
What perfecto timing! Blue would be great for
your training!
story_26_07000/2401_1001_1300_10:
Come on, let’s start the battle already! We’re 
raring to go!
story_26_07000/2401_1001_1500_10:
We accept your challenge! Battling you is just 
what we need if we want to defeat Cynthia!
story_26_07000/2401_1001_1600_10: Now that’s what I like to hear!
story_26_07000/2401_1001_1700_10:
I’ll take you on as many times as you 
want! Bring it on!
